https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rb5CMrNRmVBSiAiqnour4N6wg76.jpg Joshua and Penelope are survivors of a deadly infection that laid waste to humanity 25 years ago. When they encounter fellow survivor Abira, their lives are forever changed as they fight off the remnants of the infected. Chrysalis
